title: Apotex Ltd Recruiting Clinical Research Associate- BEC
desc:
Apotex Ltd 2019-Apply online

Apotex Ltd is inviting eligible candidates to apply online for the position of Clinical Research Associate- BEC. Candidates can  find their eligibility from below details .Eligible and interested candidates can apply from the source may provided at the bottom of this article. This content to be used only for informational purpose and not responsible for the inaccuracy or deficiency of the provided information.

Qualification: BSc/MSc/ B. Pharmacy / M. Pharmacy

Experience required: 01 – 2 Yrs

Post Name:  Clinical Research Associate- BEC

Job Description: Responsible for study management and execution of studies as per the established Standard Operating Procedures (SOP), Good Clinical Practices (GCP), Good Laboratory Practices (GLP) best practices and regulatory requirements Job Responsibilities Conducts duties following established Apotex Research Pvt. Ltd., Bioequivalence Center’s Standard Operating Procedures and in a manner consistent with the appropriate regulatory guidelines, GCP requirements and Safe Work Procedures. Assists with Protocol, ICF writing, Case Report and Assists with the preparation of screening and study documentation for data collection Assists with follow-up appointments of Subjects Assists as required in the receipt, dispensation and inventory of test articles Prepares the clinic for study conduct ensuring all furniture, supplies and equipment ready for screening/clinic activities Ensures clinic staff activities for compliance with protocol and SOPs Assists with the Collection, reviewing and summarizing of clinical data and compilation of the clinical report Assist with the distribution of test articles to subjects as delegated by the Study Coordinator Conducts activities related to the transfer of subject samples Responsible for initiation and completion of archival of clinic study raw data, documents and records. Executes other duties as may be assigned by the Clinical Operations Management/delegate as training and experience allow. Works as a member of a team to achieve all outcomes. Performs all work in support of our Corporate Values of Pride, Accountability, Integrity and Diligence; Demonstrates strong and visible support of our values. Performs all work in accordance with all established regulatory and compliance and safety requirements. All other duties as assigned.

Location:  Bangalore

Salary: NA

Time and Venue: 

About Company : Apotex is a proudly Canadian, global pharmaceutical company that produces high-quality, affordable medicines (both generic and innovative pharmaceuticals) for patients around the world. We are the 7th largest generic pharmaceutical company globally with more than 12,000 employees and estimated sales of approximately $3 billion. Our fully integrated operation is comprised of four lines of business.

Opening Date: 02-02-2019

Experience required: 2 – 6 yrs

Post Name:   Executive / Sr.exe / Asst.manager – QC Analytical – Biopharmaceuticals 

Job Description: Urgent Opening in R&D and Manufacturing for Analytical/QC candidate should be from biologics background, with min 2-5 years experience:- a) Should have hands-on experience in biopharmaceuticals Lot Release assays (glycoproteins, fusion proteins, MAbs) b) Setup, qualification of lab c) Transfer of methods from R&D to Lot release lab d) Candidates should have hands-on experience with HPLC based methods, potency assays, DLS, DSC, CD, multimode reader, HCP and HCD quantitation in the drug product and drug substance e) Should have experience in GMP documentation and SOP development f) Personnel applying for Asst Manager and above position should have had experience facing international regulatory audits g) Asst. Manager and above positions will also involve management of teams and reporting back to QC Head. They should be able to interface with QA teams and fulfill QA requirements.

Salary:  Not Disclosed by Recruiter

title: Mankind Pharma Ltd - Walk-In Interviews on 8th to 15th Mar' 2019 for Research Associates / Scientist
desc:
Walk-In Interview for Research Associate / Scientist - API
We are hiring Research Scientist for API Division - Male Candidates only
Kindly go through the details given below, if found suitable, Come with your updated resume.
Role: Research Associate /Scientist
Qualification: M.Sc- Organic Chemistry
Experience: 1 – 6 years
Openings: 10
Location:- Manesar
1. Literature search and review literature received from IPR .
2. Different route selection.
3. Design of experiments.
4. Raw materials indented.
5. Process familiarization.
6. Recording of all experiments in LNB.
7. Development of commercially viable process in lab within time line.
8. Stability study of intermediate and finish product.
9. Documentation.
10. To follow analytical / understand analytical procedure.
11. Technical discussion with Technology transfer team.
12. Hazop study.
13. Pilot study of project.
14. If any problem occurs during commercialization then resolve it within time line after discussion with seniors.
Date & Time: 8th March - 15th March, 9 AM onwards
Venue:
Mankind Research Centre,
Plot No.191-E, Sector-4 IMT,
Manesar Gurgaon

title: Pfizer Ltd Recruiting Senior Associate, Quality System
desc:
Pfizer Ltd 2019-Apply online

Pfizer Ltd is inviting eligible candidates to apply online for the position of  Senior Associate, Quality System.  Candidates can  find their eligibility from below details .Eligible and interested candidates can apply from the source may provided at the bottom of this article. This content to be used only informational purpose and not responsible for the inaccuracy or deficiency of the provided information.

Qualification: BA/BS in Science, Engineering, Pharmaceutical Sciences 

Experience required: 5 Years

Post Name:  Senior Associate, Quality System

Job Description:

Our Global Quality Operations Mission is “to be a proactive partner, driving a science and risk-based compliant quality culture that is flexible, innovative, and customer oriented, maximizing the contribution of Quality Operations to Our Path Forward initiatives.” Contract Operations Quality Assurance (COQA) drives excellence in Quality by maximizing our Partner collaboration to ensure Patients confidence in our Products. COQA is responsible for the Quality management of approximately 300 contract manufacturers, packagers, and supply partners globally. The person will be responsible for regulatory change management activities as a Site Compliance Network Member (SCNM) and management of routine product complaints for the Drug Products and Drug Substances (APIs) manufactured by Contract manufacturers.

Location: India – Mumbai

Salary: NA

Time and Venue:

 About Company : Pfizer careers are like no other. In our culture of individual ownership, we believe in our ability to improve future healthcare, and potential to transform millions of lives. We’re looking for new talent to join our global community, to unearth new innovative therapies that make the world a healthier place.

Opening Date: 08-03-2019

title: Alembic Pharmaceuticals Limited Recruiting Asst Manager / Deputy Manager : QA – Regulatory Compliance
desc:
Alembic Pharmaceuticals Limited  2019-Apply online

Alembic Pharmaceuticals Limited is inviting eligible candidates to apply online for the position of  Asst Manager / Deputy Manager : QA – Regulatory Compliance. Candidates can  find their eligibility from below details .Eligible and interested candidates can apply from the source may provided at the bottom of this article. This content to be used only for informational purpose and not responsible for the inaccuracy or deficiency of the provided information.

Qualification: B.Pharma – Pharmacy, B.Sc – Any Specialization PG:M.Pharma – Pharmacy, MS/M.Sc(Science) – Any Specialization Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required

Experience required: 7 – 11 Yrs

Post Name:  Asst Manager / Deputy Manager : QA – Regulatory Compliance 

Job Description:

Greetings from Alembic Pharmaceuticals !!! Alembic Pharmaceuticals is currently having good opportunities in Quality Assurance – Regulatory Compliance for greenfield project of Formulation Injectable based at Karakhadi in Vadodara, Gujarat.

Job responsibilities : Well conversant with various regulatory guideline requirements. Exposure of working at a regulated sterile manufacturing facility. Review of executed documents (Manufacturing/Analytical) required for regulatory submission. Exposure towards Compliance and GAP Assessments. Responsible for management of external audits, ensure site readiness for regulatory audit, management of war room. Preparation of external audit response report. Participated in US FDA, EU inspections and manage teams to support record / information requests during regulatory inspections. Implementation of Corporate Global CAPA and ensure CAPA effectiveness Improvement of Site Quality system-review of site quality management system against recent regulatory observations (USFDA, MHRA), identification of gaps in site procedure and ensure implementation of necessary preventive action at site. Deliver Quality, Compliance, and Regulatory training. Looking for professionals matching the requirement and eager to join our organization.

Location: Vadodara

Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter

Time and Venue: 

About Company : Alembic Pharmaceuticals Limited, with an established presence in the Indian pharma industry has a proud, historical track record going back one hundred years. With a turnover in excess of Rs. 3000 crores today, Alembic Pharmaceuticals Limited is one of the leading API & Formulations manufacturing and marketing pharmaceutical company.

Opening Date: 03-03-2019

desc:
Lambda Therapeutic Research Ltd Walk in on 12th – 13th March 2019 B.Pharm/M.Pharm/B.Sc/M.Sc Freshers and Experienced. Niranjan Reddy March 7, 2019
Lambda Therapeutic Research Ltd. 2019-Apply online

Lambda Therapeutic Research Ltd. is inviting eligible candidates to apply online for the position of  Clinical Research Associate/Scientist. Candidates can  find their eligibility from below details .Eligible and interested candidates can apply from the source may provided at the bottom of this article. This content to be used only informational purpose and not responsible for the inaccuracy or deficiency of the provided information.

Qualification: B. Pharm / M.Pharm / B.Sc. / M.Sc.

Experience required: 0 – 4 years

Post Name:  Clinical Research Associate/Scientist

Job Description: 1. Validate Bioanalytical method in biological matrix.2. Analyze biological samples of allotted projects.3. Handling and the operations of LC-MS/MS.4. Calibrate the pH Meter and Balance in the Bioanalytical laboratory.5. Preparing and checking of labels for Instruments, Method Validation / Development.6. Ensure effective implementation of GLP and 21 CFR by checking of instrument labels, completeness of logbooks of equipments and instruments and ensuring the instrument calibrations are done before due date.7. Reporting about the status of an on-going projects and method validation to group-leader.8. To communicate about the performance of lab equipments and status of resource availability to the group-leader.9. Develop self, and maintain knowledge in relevant field at all times.10. Work as per OECD GLP principles.

Location: Ahmedabad(Gota)

Salary: INR 1,50,000 – 2,00,000 P.A.

Time and Venue: 12th March – 13th March from 9 AM onwards Lambda Therapeutic Research Ltd. Nr. Silver Oak Engineering Collage Behind Bhavik Publication Near Gujarat High Court Gota, Ahmedabad

About Company : We, Lambda Therapeutic Research Limited are a leading global Clinical Research Organization (CRO) headquartered in Ahmedabad – India, with facilities and operations in Mumbai (India), Mehsana (India), Toronto (Canada), Warsaw (Poland), London (UK) and USA with approximate 750 employees located in our facilities across the globe.
